artist: Engraver: Alessandro Sala; After Alessandro Bonvicino

Signature and Inscription

in plate in black:[VIRGINI DEIPARE/ ET DIVO NICOLAO/ GALEATIUS ROVELLIUS/ AC

title: Virgini diepare et divo Nicolao Galeatus Rovellius ac Discipuli D
